name: Coconut Bonkers
description:
Controls:

  • Pickup / Drop -  [E], [SPACE] or [CLICK]
  • Pause - [ESC] or [P]
  • Move - [WASD] or [ARROWS]

Coconut Bonkers is a silly top-down adventure game where you must search for the treasure hidden on your island and watch out for snakes! Use the coconuts you can find to defend yourself  with and get digging!

Game created by brine and Jojy Guy with music by Puttax for Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1

With sound effects from the heroes at opengameart.org & itch.io

Special thanks to Cereal and Flame (Emotional Support) <3
